Milestone1.Title: Project Design and Approval
Milestone1.Description: The first milestone involves the completion of all design and planning phases of the project. This includes tasks such as architectural design, landscape planning, obtaining necessary permits, and finalizing all regulatory approvals. This phase ensures that the project is fully planned and ready for construction, with all legal and compliance issues addressed.

Milestone2.Title: Construction and Completion
Milestone2.Description: The second milestone marks the physical construction and finalization of the project. This step encompasses all construction activities, from laying the foundation to the final touches. It includes building the structures, completing interior and exterior works, installing utilities, and finishing with landscaping and exterior amenities. This milestone is achieved when the project passes final inspections and is ready for occupancy.
